title.narrative: 2.7. JUSTICE FOR CHILDREN

description.narrative: Output 2.7: By the end of 2021, the justice system has stronger capacity to deal with children in judicial proceedings, in line with national commitments.,which contributes to Access To Justice, Access To Justice (Covid), Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Justice For Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 2: By the end of 2021, disadvantaged children and adolescents have improved access to quality education and benefit from social services and judicial proceedings which promote their best interests

sector.narrative: Access to child-friendly police and justice sector services
Justice sector workforce strengthening and capacity building (including police)
Promoting diversion and alternatives to deprivation of liberty

description.narrative: Justice, Law and Order policy, planning and administration

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2.7: By the end of 2021, the justice system has stronger capacity to deal with children in judicial proceedings, in line with national commitments.

description.narrative: UNICEF's partnership with the Judiciary and the Ministry of Justice/National Body on the CRC contributed to enhancing the justice system's capacities for protection of children in contact with the law and children affected by migration, and promotion of child rights at both national and provincial levels. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:23/08/2020

title.narrative: Number of children in any form of detention who are released as part of COVID-19 release/amnesty [COVID]

Existence of procedures and services for children in contact with law that are applied and delivered in line with international norms
